title: SNOW ZIGGS - A League of Legends Video

embed.description: Hey guys, my name is Kid W25, and today I have some more League of Legends footage. I have my brother Lukas (FangSTORM) and our mutual mate ShouldBeLegal with me. Unfortunately, Legal was a bit tense. He was also named "Iggy" on Skype.

body:
My first go at LoPK. I actually don't mind the mode. It's quite cool.

If you guys have the spare time, please have a looksie and tell me what you think.

Cheers guys.

Kid

replies.body: How do you play this game on anything but 200+FPS..
